channel.title: [PI] run.bat and compile.bat error, problem..?
channel.description:
hello guy's, i always used delta as base. now i have joined a project and we wanna use PI because its more stable, but the run and compile bats don't work.. it said: The system can not find the path specified
i got windows xp x32 and i tryed to update jdk but the last update isn't possible for x32 so i tryed a other update but it said the system found a newer on my computer..
so i don't know what the problem is now. hope someone can help maybe a better run.bat script? and if it is needed i got teamviewer

item.title: [PI] run.bat and compile.bat error, problem..?
item.dc:creator: @ladaswa ladaswa
item.description:
@ladaswa wrote:

@echo off
title Ragnos Isle
“C:/Program files/java/jdk1.6.0_25/bin/java.exe” -Xmx300m Jframe 10 0 highmem members 32
EXIT

Go to Computer/Program files/java and look for the folder named jdk 1.#.#_##
And change the 1.6.0_25 to that number.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] run.bat and compile.bat error, problem..?
item.dc:creator: @Josephx Josephx
item.description:
@Josephx wrote:

[quote=“defer48, post:9, topic:457453”][quote author=Andys Awesome link=topic=560376.msg4091882#msg4091882 date=1346459248]

it would help if you posted the code for your compiler

@echo off title Ragnos Isle "C:/Program files (x86)/java/jre7/bin/java.exe" -Xmx300m Jframe 10 0 highmem members 32 EXIT

This is the code for the compiler we are working on the same project.

~bump
[/quote]
delete the x86[/quote]

I already posted that above xD

item.title: [PI] run.bat and compile.bat error, problem..?
item.dc:creator: @Josephx Josephx
item.description:
@Josephx wrote:

[quote=“Andys Awesome, post:7, topic:457453”][quote author=defer48 link=topic=560376.msg4091842#msg4091842 date=1346457318]
it would help if you posted the code for your compiler
[/quote]

@echo off title Ragnos Isle "C:/Program files (x86)/java/jre7/bin/java.exe" -Xmx300m Jframe 10 0 highmem members 32 EXIT

This is the code for the compiler we are working on the same project.

~bump[/quote]

I believe the code should be

@echo off
title Ragnos Isle
“C:/Program files/java/jre7/bin/java.exe” -Xmx300m Jframe 10 0 highmem members 32
EXIT

I took the (x86) that is only for some operating systems
